attachments.text:
It has been an exciting first half of the year at Betdaq Betting Exchange and I just want to showcase some of the ways we are improving liquidity at the exchange. As usual any questions just ask. We are keen to engage. 

1 - Matched Bettors (@OddsMonkey) - we are making a dent

text: <@UUE6E1LA1> useful to consider the match from the perspective of the order, if the order was already an offer in the book it is a passive match, from the perspective of the new order that hits it it is an active match. So every match has an active and a passive side.
